question: Dobby is freed at the end of the series
Draco Malfoy kills Dumbledore
Dobby is given a sock by Lucius Malfoy and is freed.
Luna Lovegood saw her father die.
Harry Potter is the nephew of Petunia Dursley.

Fred and George own a joke shop.
Tom Marvelo Riddle rearranged becomes 'I am Lord Voldermort'
Harry discovers who the Half-Blood Prince is in the beginning of the fourth book.
Hermione did not go back and finish her seventh year at Hogwarts.
Remus and Tonks get married but do not have children.
Sirius is Harry's: True - godfather, False - uncle.
Fred and George are twin brothers.
Siruis's sister is Bellatrix.
Harry and Ron took their brooms to school in the Chamber of Secrets.

Peeves can float/fly.
Muggles saw Harry cast a patronous in the fifth book.
